title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15ยง 1.5 - Conversion of a class DJ or class MJ driver's license to a class D or class M driver's license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15ยง 1.5 - Conversion of a class DJ or class MJ driver's license to a class D or class M driver's license

State Regulations

The foregoing provisions of this Part shall apply to a
class DJ or class MJ licensee who is 17 years of age and who has successfully
completed an approved high school or college driver education course and has
not converted his or her class DJ or class MJ driver's license to class D or
class M driver's license, by surrendering the junior operator blue card
(MV-285) to a motor vehicle issuing office. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15ยง
1.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
